oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Framed newspaper obituary
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a framed obituary from a Memphis newspaper of Thomas James Payne. The illustration depicts Payne as a post-war game warden and was created by A.E. Northrup. Payne served in Forrest's cavalry and was part of the group that went into the Gayoso Hotel during the Memphis raid. Payne was originally from Mississippi.
